title: Pricing Strategy Recommendation
description: An agent must recommend a pricing strategy for a new software product.

tasks.expected_outcome: Agent summarizes the pricing models of key competitors (e.g., 'Competitor A uses a per-user subscription').

tasks.description: Analyze the product's value proposition and target customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies that the product offers high value to enterprise customers.
Agent recommends a 'Value-Based' pricing strategy, arguing that the price should be based on the high value it provides to enterprises, rather than just competitor prices.
